pypi url: https://pypi.org/project/codeless/0.0.1/

documentation: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1sppPT4rLCLHlugAmQuXk0rIFnHQhXyp4?usp=sharing


1. to create dist: python setup.py sdist
2. to upload using twine: 
	twine upload --repository-url https://upload.pypi.org/legacy/ dist/*
3. incase of any error
	twine check dist/*
4. to update library: change the version number everytime.
5. upload with only changed file: 
	twine upload --skip-existing dist/*

user name: PorKy
pass: 7uX-1-99`7~H^#%=
